code: import React from'react';import'../styles/components.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProgressTracker=_ref=>{let{progress}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-tracker",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Your Learning Progress"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-overview",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-label",children:"Terms Mastered"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-fill",style:{width:"".concat(progress.termsMastered,"%")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"progress-value",children:[progress.termsMastered,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-label",children:"Courses Completed"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-fill",style:{width:"".concat(progress.coursesCompleted,"%")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"progress-value",children:[progress.coursesCompleted,"%"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recent-activity",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Recent Activity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:progress.recentActivities.map((activity,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"activity-time",children:activity.time}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"activity-text",children:activity.text})]},index))})]})]});};export default ProgressTracker;
